outline:
1. to be unclean, become unclean, become impure
    1. (Qal) to be or become unclean
      1. sexually
      2. religiously
      3. ceremonially
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to defile oneself, be defiled
        1. sexually
        2. by idolatry
        3. ceremonially
      2. to be regarded as unclean
    3. (Piel)
      1. to defile
        1. sexually
        2. religiously
        3. ceremonially
      2. to pronounce unclean, declare unclean (ceremonially)
      3. to profane (God's name)
    4. (Pual) to be defiled
    5. (Hithpael) to be unclean
    6. (Hothpael) to be defiled
kjv_def: defile (self), pollute (self), be (make, make self, pronounce) unclean, [idiom] utterly.
strongs_def: to be foul, especially in a ceremial or moral sense (contaminated)
